name: non_domestic_assaults_robberies_sydney_lga_2013_2016
title: BOCSAR Non-domestic Assaults and Robberies Sydney LGA (Point) 2013-2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Australia (CC BY 3.0 AU)

abstract:
These data reflect criminal incidents recorded by the NSW Police Force on their Computerised Operational Policing System (COPS). Criminal incidents can be either reported to police or detected by police through pro-active activity. This dataset has been compiled by the NSW Bureau of Crime Statistics and Research from a quarterly COPS download receives from the NSW Police Force. It contains incidents reported between January 2013 and March 2016 where the incident occurred at an outdoor or public place (including parks, streets, footpaths) within the Sydney Local Government Area for the following offence categories:
  • Non-domestic violence related assault
  • Robbery
  • Graffiti
  • Steal from motor vehicle
  • Motor vehicle theft
  • Possession and/or use of amphetamines
  • Possession and/or use of cannabis
  • Possession and/or use of cocaine
  • Possession and/or use of ecstasy
  • Possession and/or use of narcotics
  • Possession and/or use of other drugs
  • Robbery with a firearm
  • Robbery with a weapon that isn?t a firearm
  • Robbery without a weapon

The letters bcsr in the fields refers to BOCSAR which stands for Bureau of Crime Statistics and Research, NSW.
In the field "time interval" all incidents happening between T and T+1 are assigned to T o'clock. For instance, all instanced that occurred from 3:00pm to 3:59pm are assigned to 3. One-hour interval is deemed as the basis.

selectedAttributes.title: offence category
selectedAttributes.description: Offence categories categorised by BOCSAR

categories.key: Possession and/or use of other drugs
categories.label: Possession and/or use of other drugs

categories.key: Robbery with a weapon not a firearm
categories.label: Robbery with a weapon not a firearm

selectedAttributes.name: bcsrgccde
selectedAttributes.title: accuracy of the coordinates
selectedAttributes.description: Accuracy of the coordinates used to specify incident location

selectedAttributes.name: bcsrgclat
selectedAttributes.title: latitude
selectedAttributes.description: Latitude of the location of the incident, in GDA94

selectedAttributes.name: bcsrgclng
selectedAttributes.title: longitude
selectedAttributes.description: Longitude of the location of the incident, in GDA94

selectedAttributes.name: bcsrgrp
selectedAttributes.title: top level offence category
selectedAttributes.description: Top level offence category defined by BOCSAR

selectedAttributes.name: eventmth
selectedAttributes.title: month the event was reported
selectedAttributes.description: The month when the event was reported

selectedAttributes.name: eventyr
selectedAttributes.title: year the incident was reported to police
selectedAttributes.description: The year when the incident was reported to police; sometimes there is a delay in reporting so the incident year and the event year can differ.

selectedAttributes.name: incday
selectedAttributes.title: day of incident
selectedAttributes.description: The day of the week the incident occurred on

selectedAttributes.name: incmonth
selectedAttributes.title: month the incident occurred in
selectedAttributes.description: The month the incident occurred in

selectedAttributes.name: incsttm
selectedAttributes.title: estimated start time of the incident
selectedAttributes.description: The start of the time window when the incident could have occurred in (for offences like steal from motor vehicle where the victim isn?t present the exact time may not be known). This is used as a proxy for the time the incident occurred.

selectedAttributes.name: incyear
selectedAttributes.title: year the incident occurred in
selectedAttributes.description: The year the incident occurred in

selectedAttributes.name: lganame
selectedAttributes.title: LGA name
selectedAttributes.description: Sydney Local Government Area

selectedAttributes.name: locpcode
selectedAttributes.title: Postcode
selectedAttributes.description: Postcode where the incident occurred

selectedAttributes.name: locprmc1
selectedAttributes.title: premises type
selectedAttributes.description: Premises type where the incident occurred. The data has been restricted to outdoor/public places

selectedAttributes.name: locsurb
selectedAttributes.title: suburb
selectedAttributes.description: Suburb where the incident occurred

selectedAttributes.name: poi_age
selectedAttributes.title: Age of the person of interest (POI)
selectedAttributes.description: The age of the person of interest at the time of the incident

selectedAttributes.name: poisex
selectedAttributes.title: Gender of the person of interest (POI)
selectedAttributes.description: The gender of the person of interest (POI). There is only a value where the police identified a POI. The values can be F (female), M (male), O (organisation) and U (unknown).

selectedAttributes.description: One-hourly divided intervals from zero to 23
